Alfin Lestaluhu Meninggal Dunia, Bima Sakti Turut Berduka
01 Nov 2019, 00:44 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Kabar meninggalnya Alfin Lestaluhu membuat pelatihnya di Timnas Indonesia U-16, Bima Sakti mengalami kesedihan mendalam.
Alfin wafat pada Kamis (31/10/2019) setelah dirawat selama beberapa hari di Jakarta karena menjadi korban gempa Ambon, Maluku, pada September 2019. Gempa tersebut berkekuatan 6,8 magnitudo.
"Innalillahi wainnailaihi rajiuun. Selamat jalan Alfin. Semoga khusnul khotimah," kata Bima Sakti pada akun Instagram pribadinya, @bimasakti230176.
"Terima kasih atas perjuanganmu untuk bangsa ini. Kami telah berjuang tanpa kenal lelah, tanpa rasa takut sedikit pun seperti pesan kedua orang tua kamu."
"Jasamu pasti akan kami kenang dan kami akan meneruskan cita-citamu agar Timnas Indonesia U-16 ke depan bisa lebih baik lagi. Amin," ujar Bima Sakti.
Alfin Lestaluhu merupakan pemain andalan Bima Sakti ketika Timnas Indonesia U-16 mengarungi Kualifikasi Piala AFC U-16 2020. Berkat penampilannya, tim berjulukan Garuda Muda ini berhasil melaju ke babak putaran final pada tahun depan di Bahrain.
text:
Alfin Lestaluhu dies, the Milky Way also grieves
Nov 01 2019, 00:44 by Bola.net
Bola.net - The news of the death of Alfin Lestaluhu made his coach in the U-16 Indonesian National Team, the Milky Way experienced deep sadness.
Alfin died on Thursday (10/31/2019) after being treated for several days in Jakarta because he was a victim of the Ambon, Maluku earthquake in September 2019. The earthquake had a magnitude of 6.8 magnitude.
"Innalillahi wainnailaihi rajiuun. Goodbye Alfin. Hopefully khusnul khotimah," said the Milky Way on his personal Instagram account, @ bimasakti230176.
"Thank you for your struggle for this nation. We have fought tirelessly, without the slightest fear as the message of your parents."
"We will definitely remember your services and we will continue your aspirations so that the Indonesian U-16 national team in the future can be better. Amen," said the Milky Way.
Alfin Lestaluhu was the mainstay of the Milky Way when the Indonesian U-16 national team crossed the AFC U-16 2020 Qualification Cup. Thanks to his performance, the team nicknamed the Young Garuda succeeded in advancing to the finals round next year in Bahrain.
